msItem.title: Said-namah-i Khani.
msItem.note: Front flyleaf, recto: a) Signature of Ellis dated 16.6.04. b) prescription to improve the memory from the Imams 'Ali and Sadiq et al. Final folio, verso: a) In Ellis's hand: Hannan Watson & Co. b) Note recording completion of collation. A treatise on hunting in a preface and two chapters, with subdivisions, largely composed of descriptions of all kinds of fauna and the legal prescriptions for hunting. Headings and punctuation in red. Scribe: Possibly autograph. Dedicated to Shaikh 'Ali Khan (Zanganah).

origin.p: The work was completed in Tehran, the birthplace of the author.

acquisition.p: Provenance: Presumably with the other Ellis manuscripts.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
